Actions.Name: Scuttle Away
Actions.Description: The [name] gains the following interrupt until the start of its next turn:

Interrupts.Name: Scuttle
Interrupts.Trigger: A foe moves adjacent to the [name].
Interrupts.Effects: The [name] deals 2 damage to that foe, then may dash 3. If they move into a pit, they may also then teleport to any other pit space.

Actions.Name: Leg Trap
Actions.Description: The [name] chooses a foe in a pit anywhere. That foe becomes immobile. That foe can choose to sacrifice 6 to break themselves out of this effect as a free action on their turn, or else can save against this effect at the end of their turn, ending it on a success. If the foe is removed from the space, they also take [D]+[fray], but this effect ends.
